Entertainments Contest
Welsh Folk Museum, St Fagans, Cardiff, Wales, UK Best section 2 band - Mid Rhondda. Best soloist - Robert Nesbit (flugel) Tredegar. 10 bands competed. 2nd annual contest.
Oct. 30, 2014, 3:24 p.m. Oct. 30, 2014, 3:28 p.m.
